name: meta-accounteligibility
title: Account Eligibility
description: Analyzes a user account to determine whether it's eligible to vote in the specified event.
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-catanalysis
title: Category Analysis
description: Analyzes edits to pages in the category tree rooted at the specified category (or pages rooted at a prefix).
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-crossactivity
title: Crosswiki Activity
description: Measures a user's latest edit, bureaucrat, or sysop activity on all wikis.
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-globalgroups
title: Global Groups
description: A live review of permissions assigned to global groups on Wikimedia Foundation wikis.
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-gusersearch
title: Global User Search
description: Search and filter global users on Wikimedia wikis.
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-magicredirect
title: Magic Redirect
description: Redirects to an arbitrary URL with tokens based on user and wiki filled in.
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-stalktoy
title: Stalktoy
description: Shows global details about a user across all Wikimedia wikis. You can provide a username, an IPv4/IPv6 address, or a CIDR block.
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-stewardry
title: Stewardry
description: Estimates which users in a group are available based on their last edit or action.
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-userpages
title: User pages
description: Find your user pages on all wikis (or find wikis where you don't have user pages).
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-synchbot
title: Synchbot
description: Synchronises user pages across Wikimedia projects in every language. This allows users to create user pages on every wiki, or to have global JavaScript and CSS. (Due to potential for misuse, must submit an on-wiki request.)
author: Pathoschild
